summary: LandingPage.tsx shows a new sticky navbar, hero section, and at least the first two service-rate cards with hover lift and icon replacements via lucide-react/react-icons and inline SVG. However, the diff for LandingPage.tsx is truncated before the full services grid and subsequent sections, so several REQ-1 elements cannot be verified from the provided evidence. Additional edits to project_state.json and frontend-file-summaries.txt appear unrelated to the requested UI update.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the full "Our Service Rates" section with four service-rate cards (Sofa/AC Jet/Mattress/Carpet-Chair) matching the snippet styling and hover behavior.
missing_requirements.reason: Only the first two cards are visible in the truncated diff; the remainder of the grid (including cards 3â€“4) is not shown, so implementation of all four cards cannot be verified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the 3-item benefits strip with the same mobile border-top behavior, after the service rates section.
missing_requirements.reason: No benefits-strip markup is visible in the provided (truncated) LandingPage.tsx diff, so it cannot be confirmed.
evidence: frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx (truncated before any benefits strip section)

missing_requirements.requirement: Render the UPI + review section with heading "Scan to Pay (UPI)", the exact api.qrserver.com QR image URL from the snippet, the text "UPI ID: jrg7311@okicici", and the review link to https://share.google/CAZwztDsnRKHBaOAM.
missing_requirements.reason: Although constants for qrCodeUrl, upiId, and reviewUrl are present, the actual rendered UPI/review section (including exact user-facing copy and link usage) is not visible in the truncated diff.
evidence: frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx (constants shown but render section not visible due to truncation)

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep the floating WhatsApp button at bottom-right linking to https://wa.me/918000262644.
missing_requirements.reason: No floating button markup is visible in the truncated LandingPage.tsx diff, so it cannot be verified.
evidence: frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx (truncated before any floating action button section)

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/expanded project metadata and feature descriptions unrelated to the landing page UI change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update LandingPage.tsx UI and replace FontAwesome icons; it does not request changes to project state tracking/summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Edited frontend-file-summaries.txt to describe additional UI/animation/SEO changes not requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask to update documentation/summary files, and the summary text references changes (e.g., global styles, tailwind config, SEO metadata, animations) that are not part of the stated requirements.
